title: Arthur Baker
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809023404/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809023404/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Arthur Baker**

Arthur Baker has been drawing letters for decades and has written over 20 [books](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809023404/http:/typophile.com/wiki/books) on the subject. Along with his knowledge of [letter forms](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809023404/http:/typophile.com/wiki/letter%20forms) and historical syles of [calligraphy](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809023404/http:/typophile.com/wiki/calligraphy) and his own custom designed pens and brushes, his style is admired and imitated by many calligraphers and type [designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809023404/http:/typophile.com/wiki/designers). He currently lives in Andover, Massachusetts.

Typefaces by Arthur Baker: [Calligraphica](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809023404/http:/www.p22.com/ihof/calligraphica.html), [Mercator](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809023404/http:/www.p22.com/ihof/mercator.html).
author: paul d hunt
